update: The links on the website are now all live! Pages for Game Updates and to Report Bugs are available. We are working hard on filling in the content for the Home and About pages. The Report Bug feature is also being implemented soon.
We have entered the final stage of development for Chromashot! We now have sound effects and new visual effects added to the game, can you make it to wave 10?
